detail_desc: T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend with short raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
Short jacket in patterned faux fur with a collar, concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front, pockets in the side seams and gently gathered elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Straight-cut, faux fur jacket with a wide, lace-trimmed collar with imitation suede underneath. Concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and concealed pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a square neckline and covered buttons down the front. Long, wide sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a seam and flounce at the hem. Lined.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a square neckline and covered buttons down the front. Long, wide sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a seam and flounce at the hem. Lined.
Short blouse in crinkled chiffon with a shimmering pattern, flounced wrapover front, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and an elasticated hem. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved blouse in a viscose weave with a square, elasticated neckline front and back. Smocked seam under the bust, and a smocked seam and wide flounce at the hem.
Long-sleeved blouse in a viscose weave with a square, elasticated neckline front and back. Smocked seam under the bust, and a smocked seam and wide flounce at the hem.

Shorter jacket in corduroy made from a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and patch front pockets with a flap and button. Short tab with a button at the front of the hem and long sleeves with wide cuffs. Unlined.
Dungaree shorts in washed, stretch denim with frill trims at the front, adjustable straps, a chest pocket, side and back pockets, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Boiler suit in soft, washed denim with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. One chest pocket, side pockets, back pockets, long sleeves with a concealed press-stud at the cuffs, and gently tapered legs.
Dungarees in washed, stretch denim with adjustable straps, a high waist and zip at the front. Side and back pockets and ankle-length, flared legs.

Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Fastening with one button at the front, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Fastening with one button at the front, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Long jumper in a soft, fine knit with decorative beads at the top. Small stand-up collar, gently dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with narrow ribbing at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, a seam at the hem and a ribbed, rounded peplum.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, a seam at the hem and a ribbed, rounded peplum.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, a seam at the hem and a ribbed, rounded peplum.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, a seam at the hem and a ribbed, rounded peplum.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, a seam at the hem and a ribbed, rounded peplum.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, a seam at the hem and a ribbed, rounded peplum.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with a frill-trimmed square neckline.

Pull-on trousers in a slightly stretchy, airy cotton weave with covered elastication at the waist, a small frill trim at the top and a decorative bow and small embroidered detail at the front. Fake fly, side pockets and tapered legs.

Pull-on trousers in a slightly stretchy, airy cotton weave with covered elastication at the waist, a small frill trim at the top and a decorative bow and small embroidered detail at the front. Fake fly, side pockets and tapered legs.
Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in satin with lace details. Shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, front pockets and long sleeves with narrow cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Short skirt in woven fabric with smocking at the waist and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Short skirt in woven fabric with smocking at the waist and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft knit with pointelle-knit sections at the front and down the sleeves. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the top, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved body in soft, patterned, ribbed jersey with a V-neck front and back and press-studs at the crotch.
Top in a ribbed cotton and viscose blend with long trumpet sleeves and an overlocked edge around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with long raglan sleeves, a frill trim around the neckline and cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Short jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with long raglan sleeves, a frill trim around the neckline and cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Short jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with long raglan sleeves, a frill trim around the neckline and cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Short jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with long raglan sleeves, a frill trim around the neckline and cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Short jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with long raglan sleeves, a frill trim around the neckline and cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Short jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with long raglan sleeves, a frill trim around the neckline and cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an opening and ties at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Top in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a deep neckline and 3/4-length sleeves. Raw, roll edges around the neckline and cuffs, and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Top in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a deep neckline and 3/4-length sleeves. Raw, roll edges around the neckline and cuffs, and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Top in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a deep neckline and 3/4-length sleeves. Raw, roll edges around the neckline and cuffs, and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Top in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a deep neckline and 3/4-length sleeves. Raw, roll edges around the neckline and cuffs, and gathers in the sides for best fit.

Suit trousers in a cotton and linen weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, fake jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Suit trousers in a cotton and linen weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, fake jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with two buttons at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with two buttons at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in slub jersey with a round neck, lace yoke and straight hem.
Long-sleeved top in slub jersey with a round neck, lace yoke and straight hem.
Leggings in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist. Soft brushed inside..
Long-sleeved, hooded jacket in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Small wallet in imitation suede with a zip at the top that continues down one side. One card slot. Lined. Size 8.5x10 cm.
